SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatx1005.storage

Class H2Manager

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatx1005.storage.H2Manager
public class H2Manager extends Object

Storage for the database.

A local storage class for caching the data from the database.

Since:
V0.1.0
Author:
Hector Mendana Morales
